Decisions on the Vega network are on-cha: Decisions on the Vega network are on-chain, with tokenholders creating proposals that other tokenholders vote to approve or reject. This is how the protocol powers the creation of decentralised financial products.
And store in an Ethereum wallet. You can: And store in an Ethereum wallet. You can purchase VEGA using Ethereum (ETH) on decentralized exchanges.

A Vega wallet is used to access and sign: A Vega wallet is used to access and sign transactions and connect to any dApp running on Vega.
